name: Sikara

auras.raw_description:
ATKs all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target. Damage based on ATK

Lvl. 4 Chance +10%.
Lvl. 5 Chance +10%.
Lvl. 6 Damage +15%.

skills.name: Followup Volley
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 25% if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Aura Puncture
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Enfeebing Tips
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 60% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Devoted Sister
skills.raw_description: Revives this Champion with 75% HP when killed. Only available when Alika is on the same team

faction.raw_description: The Barbarians of Hark'han are opportunists ever eager to offertheir mercenary services to the highest bidder. When theservants of the Corruption first came from the East with theirdragon, they quickly made a pact granting them control of theregion they now patrol as the Deadlands.
